context: Note that all methods that create a locator, such as [page.getByLabel()](/docs/api/class-page#page-get-by-label), are also available on the [Locator](/docs/api/class-locator "Locator") and [FrameLocator](/docs/api/class-framelocator "FrameLocator") classes, so you can chain them and iteratively narrow down your locator.
